explanation: [0-0] The video uses a split-screen format, divided into four parts. The upper left and lower right screens are the same, as are the upper right and lower left screens. The upper left and lower right screens show white walls, white floors, and a white door, with a character in a blue jumpsuit and a blue monster head standing to the right of the door. The head is triangular with two large eyes, red lips, and white fangs. The character is wearing yellow shoes and holding a light brown doll. There is a dark green and beige carpet on the floor in the upper left corner. The upper right and lower left screens show brown wooden floors, brown brick walls, and a brown door, with a doll character in a white dress holding a baseball bat in its right hand, standing to the left of the door. The character's chest is stained with blood.

[0-9] Next, the character in the upper left and lower right screens holds the doll in their left hand and puts their right hand to their mouth. They then hit the white door with the doll, and the door opens to reveal a pink monster character. This character is wearing yellow gloves, yellow shoes, and a pink and black outfit, and makes a flying kiss gesture with both hands, sending out many pink lip prints. At the same time, the character in the upper right and lower left screens raises the baseball bat and knocks on the door. A purple furry monster character walks out, wearing pale yellow gloves and pale yellow shoes, with its hands to its mouth, constantly blowing out red lip prints and hearts. Finally, the brown door and the white door close at the same time, and the four characters return to their positions at the beginning of the video.
